lines.speaker: Guildmaster
lines.text: The hall grows quiet as the lamps are lit.

lines.speaker: Quartermaster
lines.text: Stocks are tight. We can keep one more week at this pace.

lines.speaker: Guildmaster
lines.text: Then we prioritize steady contracts over risky glory.

lines.speaker: Captain
lines.text: Morale is steady. Squads trust your calls.

lines.speaker: Guildmaster
lines.text: Good. Tomorrow we test that trust.

lines.speaker: Guildmaster
lines.text: Roster reviewed. No one goes out without proper rest.

lines.speaker: Guildmaster
lines.text: Lights out early. The squads need a calmer night.
